title: Android 13 DP1: Any app can now offer a Material You-style Themed Icon
content:
Google has shared info on how, starting with Android 13, any app can offer their own Themed Icon to appear in the Pixel Launcher and more.

more…

The post Android 13 DP1: Any app can now offer a Material You-style Themed Icon appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Starting with Android 13, any app can offer their own Themed Icon to appear in the Pixel Launcher and more.
